comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'd like to think that today I'll be able to represent. Barring any catastrophic system failures, I'll plan to head up Flagstaff at noon from Telecom. -Greg

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: No ride for me today. I'll be running home (literally), taking my dog out and then biking back to work. I need to go home and take my dog out because I'll be going straight from work to the Rockies-Giants game tonight. I hope the RTD folks will allow my giant Bonds-taunting syringe on the bus. Kevin

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: No two-wheeled fun for me today. I've got meetings, physical therapy, and EPO injections scheduled. In fact, I'll be out-of-the-office tomorrow afternoon and Monday. I hope to catch up (and drop) my fellowed Frenz on Tuesday.

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: Well, since you asked... It was a glorious evening in Westminster as the Red Foxes shutout the... whatever the other team was called by a score of 15-0. The highlight of the game was an inside-the-park grand slam by ITS' own David Cavalieri.
